name: valetudo-re
description: Self-contained control webinterface for xiaomi vacuum robots

scripts.prebuild: cp -a client client.b && find client/ -type f \( -iname \*.json -o -iname \*.js -o -iname \*.html -o -iname \*.css \) -exec gzip -9 {} +
scripts.build: pkg --targets node12.16.1-linux-armv7 --no-bytecode --options max-old-space-size=32,optimize_for_size --public-packages=prettycron . --output valetudo || npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: if [ -d client.b ]; then rm -fr client && mv client.b client; fi
